author: cnbc.com
title: Inseego reports
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ Inseego Corp. (INSG)   loss of $3.8 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the San Diego-  6 cents. Losses, adjusted for non-recurring costs and stock option expense, came to 2   holding company posted revenue of $46.5   that its loss narrowed to $45.7 million, or 78 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $219.3 million.
For the current quarter ending in April, Inseego said it expects revenue in the range of $45 million to $50 million.
